text: Best of Pandora is the first greatest hits album by Swedish Eurodance singer Pandora. It features tracks from Pandora's first two studio album, One of a Kind and Tell the World. The album was released in February 1997. The album includes four Swedish top ten and six Finnish top ten singles. ==Track listing== # "Trust Me" – 3:25 # "Tell the World" – 3:37 # "Come On And Do It" – 3:18 # "Don't You Know" – 3:49 # "One of a Kind" – 3:37 # "The Naked Sun" – 3:58 # "Something's Gone" (Ragga Dance Cut) – 4:21 # "Take My Hand" – 3:52 # "One of Us" – 4:46 # "Going to the Top" – 3:47 # "Love is a Stranger" – 3:45 # "Get Your Chance" – 4:00 # "Rely" – 4:24 # "Come On And Do It" (Rhythm Takes Control Mix) – 6:02 # "Tell the World" (Straight Outta Kalahari) – 3:49 # "The Naked Sun" (The Beduin House Camp) – 4:16 # "Don't You Know" (Peka P's Alternative Cut) – 5:35 # "Something's Gone" (Original Version) – 4:16 == Release history == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| Catalogue |- ! scope="row"| Scandinavia | February 1997 | CD, Cassette | Virgin Records |7243 8 72919 2 |} ==References== Category:Pandora (singer) albums Category:1997 compilation albums Category:Virgin Records albums Category:Compilation albums by Swedish artists
title: Best of Pandora
